articles.description: Premier League manager news conferences, team news and updates before weekend action, plus reaction to Thursday's European action.
articles.title: Europa League & Conference League: Amorim claims first Man Utd win

articles.description: Harry Brook's calculated century propels England back into the first Test against New Zealand on the second day in Christchurch.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Harry Brook and Ollie Pope rebuild tourists in Christchurch

articles.description: New Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim describes his Old Trafford welcome as "special" but admits he is "anxious" going into games.
articles.title: Man Utd 3-2 Bodo/Glimt: Ruben Amorim enjoys 'special' first win despite 'anxiety'

articles.description: Simona Halep has questioned the "big difference" in how doping cases are handled after world number two Iga Swiatek receives a one-month ban.
articles.title: Simona Halep: Two-time Grand Slam winner criticises ITIA after Iga Swiatek's doping ban

articles.description: Lando Norris says Max Verstappen "should start doing comedy" after the Dutchman suggested he could have won the world title in Norris' McLaren.
articles.title: Lando Norris: Max Verstappen 'should start doing comedy'

articles.description: The success of teenager Luke Littler has seen interest in darts explode, with an increase in viewing figures, ticket sales and media coverage.
articles.title: Luke Littler: Darts hits the bullseye with teenager's rapid rise

articles.description: Mohamed Salah is a target of Saudi clubs, Manchester United are preparing a £50m move for Tomas Araujo, and Arsenal's hopes of signing Viktor Gyokeres are dealt a blow.
articles.title: Football gossip: Salah, Araujo, Guehi, Gyokeres, Isak, Luiz, Almiron

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on boxer Sunny Edwards with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v boxer Sunny Edwards

articles.description: With his two-goal performance against Nice, has Hamza Igamane pushed himself to the front of the queue to start up front for Rangers?
articles.title: Rangers: Has Hamza Igamane announced himself as main man?

articles.description: Mats Hummels' stoppage time goal denies Tottenham victory in an entertaining 2-2 draw in the Europa League.
articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur 2-2 Roma: Mats Hummels equaliser denies Spurs victory
